Class Sidebar.ScoreboardLine

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.scoreboard.Sidebar.ScoreboardLine
Enclosing class:
Sidebar
public static class Sidebar.ScoreboardLine extends Object
This class is used to create a line for the sidebar.
